select plan_idx, user_idx, plan_title, plan_create, plan_update, plan_start, plan_end, plan_like, plan_hit from plan where plan_idx = #{plan_idx}

insert into plan (user_idx, plan_type) values (#{user_idx}, #{plan_type} )
select last_insert_id()
mapper.update: update plan set plan_hit = plan_hit + 1 where plan_idx = #{plan_idx}
mapper.select: select a.plan_idx, b.plan_comment_idx, b.user_idx, b.plan_comment_create, b.plan_comment_update, b.plan_comment_content from plan a left join plan_comment b on a.plan_idx = b.plan_idx where a.plan_idx = #{plan_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into plan_detail (plan_idx, content_id, detail_order) values (#{plan_idx}, #{content_id}, #{detail_order})
insert into plan_comment (user_idx, plan_idx, plan_comment_content) values (#{user_idx}, #{plan_idx}, #{plan_comment_content})
